Reader

Interface implemented by different reader types.  While it is possible to use a specific reader directly, it's best to use the newReader function to create one based on the retrievalMethod you desire.

Functions
retrieve

Optional method which Pops open QRCode or NFC Reader to scan the date The user can use their own QR Code scanner or NFC Reader to build a scan result with though

validate

Uses the retrieval result to establish the transport connection, receives the mDL and validates it against any certificate in the CertificateManager

validate_with_cert

Uses the retrieval result to establish the transport connection, receives the mDL and validates it against the specified certificate.
